nodeList.loreText: Swirling through the air, these hammers would be elegant were it not for the blood and broken bones they left behind them.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Throws a hammer that returns to you after a short delay.

node.loreText: Swirling through the air, these hammers would be elegant were it not for the blood and broken bones they left behind them.
node.nodeDescription: Throws a hammer that returns to you after a short delay.

nodeList.description:
Hammer Throw can no longer spiral, chain, or orbit.

If your hammers would spiral, they instead deal significantly more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

If your hammers would chain, they instead deal more critical damage for each time they would chain.

If your hammers would orbit you, they instead have additional base critical strike chance.

Hammer Throw hits deal increased damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Can no longer spiral or chain

If your hammers would spiral they instead deal 80% increased damage

If your hammers would chain they instead have 40% additional critical strike multiplier for each time they would have chained

If your hammers would orbit you they instead have 4% additional base critical strike chance

Your number of extra projectiles cannot be reduced

10% increased damage

node.description: Hammer Throw has increased attack speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased attack speed per point

node.loreText: Swirling through the air, these hammers would be elegant were it not for the blood and broken bones they left behind them.
node.nodeDescription: Throws a hammer that returns to you after a short delay.

nodeList.description: When you are out of mana Hammer Throw is free.

nodeList.altText: {Disintegrating Aura} scales with your increases to void damage, damage over time, and throwing attack damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless specifically stated otherwise.
nodeList.description: {Disintegrating Aura} deals more damage, and Hammer Throw costs less mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The disintegrating aura deals [25%] increased damage per point. Subtracts [1] mana cost per point.

node.altText: {Disintegrating Aura} scales with your increases to void damage, damage over time, and throwing attack damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless specifically stated otherwise.
node.description: Your hammers gain a {Disintegrating Aura}, causing enemies nearby them to take 30 void damage per second, but Hammer Throw costs more mana and has reduced attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription:
+12 mana cost. 20% reduced attack speed.

Enemies take 20 void damage per second while near a thrown hammer.

Hammer Throw launches additional hammers, but Hammer Throw costs more mana.

Hammers from the same throw cannot hit the same enemy, unless they spiral.

nodeList.altText: Buffs granted by {Zeal} are global. You can have a maximum of 3 stacks of {Zeal}.
nodeList.description: Using Hammer Throw grants you a stack of {Zeal} for 4 seconds, which increases your damage and critical strike chance by 10% per stack.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
When you use hammer throw you gain 1 stack of Zeal for 4 seconds. You can have up to 3 stacks of Zeal.

Each stack of Zeal grants [10%] increased damage and critical strike chance per point.
